element.short: Context of activities covered by this exception
element.definition: The context of the activities a user is taking - why the user is accessing the data - that are controlled by this exception.
element.comment: E.g. if the purpose is 'research', then the operational context must be research, in order for the consent to apply. Not all of the security labels make sense for use in this element (may define a narrower value set?).

binding.description: What purposes of use are controlled by this exception. If more than one label is specified, operations must have all the specified labels
